templates.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
templates.description: Instantly respond to new leads with personalized welcome message and nurture sequence. Includes SMS + Email follow-up.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation:
# New Lead Welcome Sequence

This template creates an instant connection with new leads by:
1. Sending immediate SMS within 60 seconds
2. Following up with email after 1 hour
3. Updating lead status to 'contacted'

**Best for:** All real estate agents who want fast lead response

templates.name: No Response Follow-up
templates.description: Automatically follow up with leads who haven't responded after 48 hours with personalized messaging.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Automatically reach out to unresponsive leads with a friendly check-in message.

templates.name: Appointment Reminder Series
templates.description: Send timely reminders before scheduled appointments (24h, 2h, 30min) to reduce no-shows by 70%.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation:
# Appointment Reminder Series

Reduces no-shows with 3-stage reminder system:
- 24 hours before
- 2 hours before
- 30 minutes before

templates.name: Hot Lead Fast Track
templates.description: Priority handling for high-score leads (80+). Instant notification + immediate outreach to convert while they're hot.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Automatically fast-track your hottest leads with immediate agent notification and outreach.

templates.name: Price Drop Alert
templates.description: Notify leads when properties they viewed drop in price. Creates urgency and drives bookings.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Alert interested buyers when prices drop to create urgency and drive action.

templates.name: Cold Lead Reactivation Campaign
templates.description: Win back leads that went cold 30+ days ago with a 3-step reactivation sequence.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Revive dormant leads with market updates and new listings matching their criteria.

templates.name: Post-Viewing Follow-up
templates.description: Structured follow-up after property viewings to gather feedback and move deals forward.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Follow up after property viewings to capture interest and address concerns.

templates.name: Birthday & Anniversary Messages
templates.description: Automated personal touches for client birthdays and home purchase anniversaries. Build lasting relationships.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Never forget important dates. Automated personal messages build loyalty and referrals.

templates.name: Referral Request Workflow
templates.description: Ask happy clients for referrals at the perfect moment (30 days after closing). Grows your business organically.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Systematically request referrals from satisfied clients to grow your business.

templates.name: Open House Promotion
templates.description: Promote open houses with multi-channel blasts (SMS + Email + Social) and track RSVPs.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Multi-channel promotion for maximum open house attendance.

templates.name: Market Update Newsletter
templates.description: Monthly market update emails to keep your database engaged with local market trends and insights.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Keep your database warm with valuable market insights and establish yourself as the local expert.

templates.name: First-Time Buyer Education Series
templates.description: 7-part email series educating first-time buyers about the process, building trust and positioning you as advisor.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Comprehensive education series that builds trust with first-time buyers.

templates.name: Under Contract Nurture
templates.description: Keep buyers engaged during the inspection and closing period with updates, tips, and excitement-building.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Keep buyers excited and informed during the often-stressful closing period.

templates.name: Listing Expiration Outreach
templates.description: Target expired listings in your area with compassionate outreach and value proposition.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation:
# Expired Listing Outreach

Proven 4-step sequence for converting expired listings:
1. Compassionate initial contact
2. Market analysis offer
3. Success stories
4. Call-to-action

**Premium Template** - Includes proven scripts and timing.

templates.name: FSBO Conversion Sequence
templates.description: Convert For-Sale-By-Owner listings with education about benefits of working with an agent.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Tactfully approach FSBO sellers with value-focused messaging.

templates.name: Luxury Property Showcase
templates.description: Elegant, high-touch communication sequence for luxury properties ($1M+). White-glove service automation.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation:
# Luxury Property Showcase

Premium workflow designed specifically for high-net-worth clients:
- Sophisticated messaging
- Private showing coordination
- Concierge-level service
- Lifestyle marketing

**Premium Template** - $99

templates.name: Investor Lead Qualifier
templates.description: Qualify and segment real estate investors based on investment criteria, budget, and timeline.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Specialized workflow for working with real estate investors.

templates.name: Mortgage Pre-Approval Push
templates.description: Encourage leads to get pre-approved with your preferred lender. Includes incentive offers.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Get buyers pre-approved faster to close more deals.

templates.name: Closing Day Celebration
templates.description: Celebrate closing day with clients and set stage for future referrals. Includes review request.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Turn closing day into a celebration and request reviews while excitement is high.

templates.name: Seller Market Update Loop
templates.description: Keep potential sellers engaged with monthly home value estimates and market trends for their area.
templates.author: Jorge Real Estate
templates.documentation: Stay top-of-mind with potential sellers by providing ongoing value.
